_sText:
Surf_the_gloaming, by Roosta

After an extended leave of absence from the surf mapping community due to intense school work, I am finally back and mapping. I begin my return with this map: surf_the_gloaming (pronounced "the glow-ming").

This map all begins with FAJ (what good maps isn't he a part of?). He told me to get off my lazy ass and make an "EPIC" surf map. After much enticing, I finally got around to doing it. This is the result. I am not so sure how epic this map is; I leave that to you to decide. I incorporated all aspects of mapping in which I am proficient: skyboxes, ramps, neat geometry, flow, learning curves, texturing, and logic systems. This map has taught me much.

It's just a linear surf map. Nothing more, nothing less (well, maybe a little bit more). There are a few secrets, some of which I particularly enjoy (Scout Battles!)

I have MANY people I need to thank for helping me test this map (in no particular order):

Teeth
shini
intox.Juicy J
